meanings.sent1: The acuminous thorn pricked my finger.
meanings.sent2: Be careful with the acuminous knife.
meanings.sent3: The acuminous pencil tip drew a precise line.
meanings.sent4: Her acuminous gaze pierced through the darkness.
meanings.sent5: The acuminous mountain peak stood tall against the sky.

meanings.definition: Having a sharp or pointed tip
meanings.sent1: The acuminous leaves of the plant were dangerous to touch.
meanings.sent2: The acuminous icicle hung from the roof.
meanings.sent3: The acuminous arrowhead was carefully crafted for accuracy.
meanings.sent4: The acuminous spire of the castle reached towards the clouds.
meanings.sent5: The acuminous teeth of the saw cut through the wood effortlessly.

meanings.sent1: Her acuminous observations helped solve the mystery.
meanings.sent2: The detective's acuminous mind uncovered the truth.
meanings.sent3: The acuminous student quickly grasped the complex concept.
meanings.sent4: His acuminous analysis of the situation impressed everyone.
meanings.sent5: The acuminous artist captured the essence of the scene in her painting.
